document_data.caption: A map of Huzuz showing the Avenue of Wealth lined in black.
document_data.name: Avenue of Wealth
document_data.mainbody: The '''Avenue of Wealth''' was located in [[Huzuz]], the City of Delights, in [[1367 DR]].{{AQ-time}}
document_data.Description: This street entered Huzuz through the [[Gate of Wealth]]. It served as the border between the [[East District]], [[Affluent District]], and [[Court District]]. The Avenue of Wealth ran southeast to northwest through the city until it terminated at the [[Caravan Boulevard]] near the middle of Huzuz.
